data.eml:eml: Krobia petitella, a new species of cichlid fish from the Berbice River in Guyana (Teleostei: Cichlidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Steele, Sarah E., Liverpool, Elford, López-Fernández, Hernán (2013): Krobia petitella, a new species of cichlid fish from the Berbice River in Guyana (Teleostei: Cichlidae). Zootaxa 3693 (2): 152-162, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3693.2.2
